content: granny wig hair rollers crochet pattern in my tutorial i walk you through the pattern step by step this adorable wig is great for halloween costumes everyday dress up and to celebrate the one hundredth day of school i hope you like my pattern enjoy granny wig video tutorial 1 https //www youtube com/channel/ucjsjdciodrdv7-vlxwk9nhg https //lovableloops com/patterns/ **supplies needed** j crochet hook foam rollers gray worsted weight yarn tapestry needles stitch markers small scissors 1 https //youtu be/iiv3j40myga
